title: 有没有能让苦力怕不破坏地形但是村民依然可以耕地的指令
author: 1726631630@qq.
txt_content: 有没有比/gamerule mobGriefing false更完善的指令

replies.author: xmdhs
vp_nako
replies.txt_content: 或许可以不让creeper出现在地图里？重复命令方块kill @e[type=creeper]或着tp @e[type=creeper] 0 -2 0   理论上能使苦力怕不破坏地形，但是你也没办法攻击苦力怕

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
1726631630@qq. 发表于 2019-12-28 18:43
1.15.1
.。。。。
高频
/execute as @e[type=minecraft:creeper] run data merge entity @s {ExplosionRadius:0}

replies.author: gushunyi
replies.txt_content: 苦力怕烦死了  我也来学习一下
